item.title: 穆迪称，撒哈拉以南非洲经济体为 2025 年做好了充分准备
item.description: 据穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）称，受能源和基础设施投资以及服务业扩大的推动，撒哈拉以南非洲地区的经济增长率预计将从 2024 年的 3.8% 提高到今年的平均 4.2%。【原文：Sub-Saharan Africa’s economic growth is expected to improve to an average 4.2% this year from an estimated 3.8% in 2024, boosted by investments in energy and infrastructure and an expanded services sector, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 公用事业公司究竟如何确定电价
item.description: 美国的公用事业有几件大事要做。一方面，它们需要向客户提供负担得起的可靠电力。另一方面，它们还需要维护和升级大量的固定基础设施。由于美国电网的老化和向可再生能源的转变，平衡这两项工作变得越来越复杂。那么，大型电力公司是如何平衡这两个目标的呢？它们如何决定需要多少资金来资助新的资本投资？如何【原文：Utilities in the US have a couple big jobs to do. On the one hand, they need to deliver affordable and reliable power to their customers. On the other hand, they also need to maintain and upgrade huge amounts of fixed infrastructure. Balancing those two jobs is getting more complicated thanks to America's aging electricity grid and the shift towards renewables. So how are big utilities squaring those two objectives? How do they decide how much money they need to fund new capital investment? How】

item.title: 英国工党是否正面临莉兹-特鲁斯（Liz Truss）时刻？
item.description: 英国债券的暴跌唤起了人们对利兹-特拉斯（Liz Truss）担任首相期间市场危机的回忆，也引发了人们对财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）预算计划的质疑。【原文：A rout in UK bonds has evoked memories of the market crisis during Liz Truss’s calamitous premiership and raised questions over Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ budget plans.】

item.title: 阿塞拜疆飞机坠毁后欧洲警告航空公司注意俄罗斯领空
item.description: 在阿塞拜疆航空公司一架客机坠毁后，欧盟航空安全局警告航空公司不要前往俄罗斯的几个城市。【原文：The European Union Aviation Safety Agency warned airlines to steer clear of several cities in Russia following the fatal crash of an Azerbaijan Airlines passenger jet that was likely shot down by Russian forces.】

item.title: 你在抱怨什么？经济学家抨击特朗普的加拿大贸易主张
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普以美国贸易赤字为由，威胁要对加拿大征收 25% 的关税。加拿大顶级经济学家对此有一个回应：这都是因为你们国家想要廉价石油。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump has justified his threat of 25% tariffs on Canada by pointing to the US trade deficit. Top Canadian economists have a response to that: it’s all because your country wants cheap oil.】

item.title: 与奥巴马关系密切的私募股权投资公司完成 30 亿美元基金募集
item.description: 专门从事中型企业投资的私募股权公司 Vistria Group LP 完成了一笔 30 亿美元的基金交易，使其管理的资产规模达到约 160 亿美元。【原文：Vistria Group LP, a private equity firm that specializes in midsize companies, closed a $3 billion fund in a deal that lifts its assets under management to about $16 billion.】

item.title: 连续年度亏损后，石油算法交易商放松了对市场的控制
item.description: 在连续第二年亏损后，主导石油市场的算法交易商正在从大宗商品中撤出。【原文：The algorithmic traders who have come to dominate the oil market are pulling back from the commodity after a second successive year of losses.】

item.title: 达拉斯罕见冰雪天气导致全美数百航班停飞
item.description: 一场冬季风暴给达拉斯带来了大雪，并给美国南部带来了冰雪威胁，导致 1,000 多架航班停飞，并增加了整个地区停电的风险。【原文：A winter storm that brought snow to Dallas and threatens the US South with ice and sleet has grounded more than 1,000 flights and is raising the risk of power outages through the region.】

item.title: 加贝里在 Skydance 交易之争中向派拉蒙索取文件
item.description: 基金经理马里奥-加贝利（Mario Gabelli）要求法官让派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）交出其与 Skydance Media 合并的相关文件，以便投资者了解控股股东莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）在这笔交易中得到了什么，以及是否公平。【原文：Money manager Mario Gabelli is asking a judge to make the film and TV company Paramount Global hand over files about its merger with Skydance Media so investors can tell what controlling stockholder Shari Redstone is getting in the deal and whether it’s fair.】

item.title: 加纳新任财政部长表示将寻求更多国际货币基金组织（IMF）资助
item.description: 加纳新任财政部长卡西尔-阿托-福尔松（Cassiel Ato Forson）表示，这个西非国家希望从国际货币基金组织获得更多支持。【原文：Ghana’s new Finance Minister Cassiel Ato Forson said the West African nation hoped to secure more support from the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 特朗普还未宣誓就职就测试最高法院的权力
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普甚至还没有上任，就已经在开始他的第二个总统任期，测试美国最高法院会在多大程度上满足他的要求。【原文：Donald Trump hasn’t even taken office, and he is already testing how far the US Supreme Court will yield to his demands as he starts his second term as president.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF 支持的冷却公司利用花旗银行和 SNB Capital 进行 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特 Tabreed 地区冷却公司正在与花旗集团和 SNB Capital 合作，准备在利雅得进行首次公开募股。【原文：Saudi Tabreed District Cooling Co. is working with Citigroup Inc. and SNB Capital for a potential initial public offering in Riyadh, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称不确定因素表明 2025 年将放缓缩表步伐
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，由于官员们面临着美国经济前景的 "相当大的不确定性"，现在应该放慢调整利率的步伐。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said a slower approach to adjusting interest rates is merited now as officials confront “considerable uncertainty” over the US economic outlook.】

item.title: 美联储哈克表示将进一步降息，但时机尚不确定
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）表示，官员们正按计划在今年降低利率，但具体时间将取决于经济的发展情况。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker said officials are on track to lower interest rates this year, but the exact timing will depend on what happens with the economy.】

item.title: 卢旺达领导人称卢旺达与刚果叛军毫无关系
item.description: 卢旺达总统保罗-卡加梅表示，卢旺达与在刚果民主共和国东部矿产资源丰富的地区活动的 M23 叛乱分子毫无关系，否认了联合国报告中的指控。【原文：Rwandan President Paul Kagame said his nation has nothing to do with M23 rebels operating in mineral-rich territories in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, denying allegations in a United Nations report.】

item.title: 英国纸币印刷商收到寻求入股的投资者报价
item.description: De La Rue Plc 收到了与去年提议收购这家英国货币印刷商近一半股份的投资者对整个公司的收购邀约。【原文：De La Rue Plc got a takeover approach for the entire company by the same investors who proposed to buy almost half of the British currency printer last year.】

item.title: 特里-史密斯因担心减肥药物而抛售帝亚吉欧股票
item.description: 英国基金经理特里-史密斯（Terry Smith）出售了他在帝亚吉欧公司（Diageo Plc）的股份，理由是担心这家饮料公司的管理及其易受减肥药需求飙升的影响。【原文：British fund manager Terry Smith has sold his stake in Diageo Plc, citing concerns about the management of the drinks company and its vulnerability to soaring demand for weight-loss drugs.】

item.title: 开发商融创中国在香港收到清盘申请
item.description: 据香港司法网站报道，违约建筑商融创中国控股有限公司已在香港收到清盘申请。【原文：Defaulted builder Sunac China Holdings Ltd. has received a liquidation petition in Hong Kong, according to the city’s judiciary website.】

item.title: 土耳其小众债务投资者转而购买短期债券
item.description: Abrdn Investments 公司的基兰-柯蒂斯（Kieran Curtis）是最早发现土耳其一种鲜为人知的浮动利率债券商机的外国投资者之一，当时土耳其的利率正飙升至历史新高。【原文：Abrdn Investments’ Kieran Curtis was one of the first foreign investors to spot an opportunity in a little-known type of Turkish floating-rate bonds when the country’s interest rates were surging to all-time highs.】

item.title: 阿根廷官员称该国已偿还主权债务
item.description: 阿根廷在周四的最后期限之前向国际债券持有人支付了款项，这标志着哈维尔-米莱伊总统为恢复投资者对这个连续违约国的信心所做的努力又迈出了一步。【原文：Argentina paid international bondholders before a Thursday deadline, marking another step in President Javier Milei’s efforts to restore investors’ confidence in the serial defaulter.】

item.title: 沃达丰 Idea 通过优先配售融资 2.22 亿美元
item.description: 印度沃达丰Idea有限公司通过向沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）旗下实体优先配股的方式筹集了191亿卢比（约合2.22亿美元）的资金，这家未盈利的无线运营商正努力在与大型竞争对手的竞争中扭亏为盈。【原文：India’s Vodafone Idea Ltd. has raised 19.1 billion rupees ($222 million) via a preferential allotment of shares to entities belonging to Vodafone Group Plc as the unprofitable wireless operator seeks to turnaround its business amid battles with larger rivals.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团退出与威玛的合资企业，拟融资 8.33 亿美元
item.description: 阿达尼集团将通过出售在孟买上市的阿达尼威玛有限公司（Adani Wilmar Ltd. ）最多 20% 的股份来筹集 714.8 亿卢比（8.33 亿美元）的资金，以退出非核心业务，专注于基础建设业务。【原文：The Adani Group will raise 71.48 billion rupees ($833 million) by selling up to 20% stake in Mumbai-listed Adani Wilmar Ltd. as it exits non-core activities to focus on the bread-and-butter infrastructure businesses.】

item.title: Vitol和Uniper支付1700万英镑帮助英国维持照明
item.description: 本周三，在零度以下的气温导致需求增加的同时，风力供应却减少了，两家燃气发电厂因此获得了数百万英镑的补贴，以弥补电力缺口。【原文：A pair of gas-fired power plants were paid millions of pounds on Wednesday to plug a shortfall when wind supply dropped at the same time as sub-zero temperatures increased demand.】

item.title: 双子座在欧洲招聘高级人员，扩大在该地区的业务
item.description: 温克艾沃斯双胞胎的 Gemini Trust Co LLC 加密货币交易所在欧洲任命了一系列高级职位，因为该公司今年将根据该集团的新监管制度在欧洲扩大业务。【原文：The Winklevoss twins’ Gemini Trust Co LLC crypto exchange has made a slew of senior appointments in Europe, as it seeks to grow its presence in the region this year under the bloc’s new regulatory regime.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩选举美国支持的总统奥恩，转向伊朗
item.description: 黎巴嫩选举军队指挥官约瑟夫-奥恩（Joseph Aoun）为该国两年多来的首任总统，他选择了美国支持的候选人，这表明伊朗在该地区的影响力正在减弱。【原文：Lebanon elected army commander Joseph Aoun as the country’s first president in more than two years, picking a US-backed candidate in a sign of Iran’s waning influence in the region.】

item.title: 开普勒预计到 2027 年回购 150 亿美元，瑞银创 2008 年新高
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）巩固了近期在 2008 年高点的涨势，因为 Kepler Cheuvreux SA 称，该银行可以克服对更高资本要求的担忧，在未来几年通过股票回购分配多达 150 亿美元的资金。【原文：UBS Group AG cemented recent gains at 2008 highs as Kepler Cheuvreux SA said the lender can overcome concerns over higher capital requirements and distribute as much as $15 billion through share buybacks in the next few years.】

item.title: 阿波罗的 Zelter 认为私营和公共市场的障碍正在消失
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司联席总裁詹姆斯-泽尔特（James Zelter）在接受彭博电视采访时说，随着公司越来越多地受益于更广泛的融资选择，私人市场和公共市场之间的壁垒正在逐渐降低。【原文：As companies increasingly benefit from a wider range of financing options, the barriers between private and public markets are coming down, James Zelter, co-president of Apollo Global Management Inc. said in an interview on Bloomberg TV.】

item.title: 员工推荐技术工作如何成为副业
item.description:
向 Microsoft 和 Nvidia 等公司推荐陌生人已成为富有进取心的员工的一项副业

。【原文：

Recommending strangers to companies like Microsoft and Nvidia has become a side hustle for enterprising employees

】

item.title: 不要被石油在 2025 年的强劲开局所迷惑
item.description:
如果生产商的业绩记录能够说明问题，那么原油在年初的上涨势头将不会持续下去。【原文：

Crude’s advance at the beginning of the year won’t last if producers’ track record is any guide.

】

item.title: 巴西零售销售下滑，高借贷成本将上升
item.description: 巴西 11 月份的零售销售下滑幅度略高于预期，这主要是受到高利率的影响，而随着巴西央行采取行动抑制高于目标的通胀率，高利率还将继续上升。【原文：Brazil’s retail sales slid slightly more than expected in November, buffeted by high interest rates that are poised to keep rising as the central bank moves to tamp down above-target inflation.】
